
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/yelanggu/p/18730829" title="发布于 2025-02-22 14:00">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">Python中requests库的安装</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p>这篇博客指导读者如何通过管理员权限的CMD命令行，进入Python主目录并使用pip安装requests库。在PyCharm中，如果IDE未检测到requests，用户需要在此安装，或者考虑更新Python版本。</p>
<p>&nbsp;首先我们需要用<a class="hl hl-1" href="https://so.csdn.net/so/search?q=%E7%AE%A1%E7%90%86%E5%91%98%E6%9D%83%E9%99%90&amp;spm=1001.2101.3001.7020" target="_blank" data-report-click="{&quot;spm&quot;:&quot;1001.2101.3001.7020&quot;,&quot;dest&quot;:&quot;https://so.csdn.net/so/search?q=%E7%AE%A1%E7%90%86%E5%91%98%E6%9D%83%E9%99%90&amp;spm=1001.2101.3001.7020&quot;,&quot;extra&quot;:&quot;{\&quot;searchword\&quot;:\&quot;管理员权限\&quot;}&quot;}" data-tit="管理员权限" data-pretit="管理员权限" rel="noopener nofollow">管理员权限</a>打开CMD命令窗口，然后进入到python主目录中，然后输入<span class="edu-hl hl hl-1" data-report-click="{&quot;spm&quot;:&quot;1001.2101.3001.7020&quot;,&quot;extra&quot;:&quot;{\&quot;word\&quot;:\&quot;pip\&quot;}&quot;}" data-tit="pip" data-pretit="pip">pip&nbsp;install&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="words-blog hl-git-1" data-tit="requests" data-pretit="requests">requests。</span></span></p>
<p>然后我们进入到我们的<a class="hl hl-1" href="https://so.csdn.net/so/search?q=ide&amp;spm=1001.2101.3001.7020" target="_blank" data-report-click="{&quot;spm&quot;:&quot;1001.2101.3001.7020&quot;,&quot;dest&quot;:&quot;https://so.csdn.net/so/search?q=ide&amp;spm=1001.2101.3001.7020&quot;,&quot;extra&quot;:&quot;{\&quot;searchword\&quot;:\&quot;ide\&quot;}&quot;}" data-tit="ide" data-pretit="ide" rel="noopener nofollow">ide</a>中，我的是<span class="words-blog hl-git-1" data-tit="PyCharm" data-pretit="pycharm">PyCharm，如下图所示：</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/116961/202502/116961-20250222135854699-1126505158.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;这里选择我们自己的python安装目录</p>
<p>如果在这里没有requests那我们就需要在这里安装一下，如果还不行，我们就更新一下我们的python就好了</p>
</div>
<div class="clear"></div>

            </div>
